post.content: ### The Amazon Example - what is wrong with the amazon example? - baby badwater - voorbeeld: inladen per pixel - lasagnoli - example of circular nature of software engineering fads ### Presentation [![Presentation about micro services to students of VU Amsterdam](/images/play_presentation.webp)](https://youtu.be/HDs-pCsEzKM)
